name: Two Bros Chillin' In A Hot Tub 6 Feet Apart Cuz They're Not Gay (Except They Probably Are)
name_original: Two Bros Chillin' In A Hot Tub 6 Feet Apart Cuz They're Not Gay (Except They Probably Are)
description:
You’re at the party of a friend of a friend of a friend. There’s a hot tub. You’re hanging out in it. Someone new arrives. You know them a little bit, maybe you got introduced earlier in the night? They seem cool. Really cool. You have something you want from them, or something you want to do with them. But you don’t want to actually have to ask: whether you never make first moves, or you always make first moves and you’re tired of it - wouldn’t it be nice if they asked you?

This LARP was originally written to be played in an actual hot tub, although it could be played in any space where two people can speak to each other. This is a short, GM-less game for two players. Recommended Print and Play, cutting each character sheet in half. Alternatively, grab a full page and choose which of the two characters you would like to play.

Content Note: Light romance/crushes
